Title: Requires notification of residents who are potentially affected by a serious health threat to their water system
Summary: Requires notification of residents who are potentially affected by a serious health threat to their water system within 24 hours of receiving investigation results.
LawCode: Amd ยง17-194.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring notification of residents who are potentially affected by a serious health threat to their water system
